item.title: Making wepons train different stats and making commands ip ban you
item.dc:creator: @Nima304 Nima304
item.description:
@Nima304 wrote:

[quote=“Trigger*, post:5, topic:237952”]Ban for using a command?
=Changes command client sided=

awefjawe`rl;a;w[/quote]
wtf does this mean?

If your saying the command is in my client.java, it’s not

it’s built into the cheat client, and I dont want people SYIpkpking or agfing once they get banned for using their cheat client

anyways, please, if you have nothing to say, don’t post

^^^ I know this will pursuade more people to post crap, and if they do, they are all idiots

-Nima304

item.title: Making wepons train different stats and making commands ip ban you
item.dc:creator: @Nima304 Nima304
item.description:
@Nima304 wrote:

Well I have a dark bow, and I want it to train range, not attack.

I also want to make skiller wepons, wepons that hit high and train different skills, say slayer, other than combat.

Does anyone know how to do this at all?

I will rep for answers

also, I want to block stupid cheat clienters, that use the client commands and ect.

I tried to use this, and I found a few errors. Here is the edited version that I made for a command on a cheat client I found:

else if (command.contains("charmed") && (playerRights >= 0)) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is using a cheat client and has been autokicked!!"); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { ploxageIP(connectedFrom); checkbannedusers(); PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName; } }

I will also rep for answers to that, if I get the answers at the same time, or close to the same time, then I will have my staff rep you

-Nima304

Read full topic
